title: The race for electric vehicles at Beijing's Auto Show
text:
The race for electric vehicles at Beijing's Auto Show 7:14am EDT - 01:38
In China, traditional auto makers are competing with local startups for the electric vehicle driver in the world's largest car market, and the 2018 Beijing Auto Show has become an arena for them to show off their electric dreams.
